AccountType.title: Who will be using TaskBlast?
AccountType.type: Choose the account type that best describes the primary user of TaskBlast.
AccountType.managedesc: For depends. SOme features are restricted and controlled by a parent/guardian PIN.
AccountType.indedesc: For individual learners. Full access without restrictions.
